description.english: Unlock 400 enemy abilities in the Monsterpedia.
Acquire 500 Potions from the Golden Statue.
Acquire 50 Premium Potions from the Golden Statue.
Open 200 chests that has an upgraded item without rerolling.
See an upgraded item after rerolling, 100 times.
You didn't win, it was a draw!
Retry and win a lost battle.
Win an adventure after coming back from retry.
Offer 1000 equipments to the Golden Statue.
Deal 2 Million Physical Damage with Dio. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Magic Damage with Dio. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Physical Damage with Rin. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Magic Damage with Rin. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Physical Damage with Selene. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Magic Damage with Selene. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Physical Damage with Jirah. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Magic Damage with Jirah. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Fire Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Ice Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Water Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Earth Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Wind Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Electric Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Light Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Dark Damage. (won battles only)
Deal 2 Million Shadow Damage. (won battles only)
Trigger Bleeding via Hemorrhaging Attacks, 1000 times.
Activate Cold Snap on enemies with Frozen Wound, 200 times.
Visit the Marsh of Crocs, 100 times.
Go inside the Belly of the Beast, 100 times.
Go to the Mirrors of Ice, 100 times.
Have a total of 1 Million Direct Healing.  (won battles only)
Have a unit reach 100% Crit Chance (outside battle), use it on battle, and win.
Have a unit reach 100% Fortune (outside battle), use it on battle, and win.
Have a unit reach level 30, bring it to battle, and win.
You tried to steal from The Forgotten.
